name: On Deck
text:
Specialty Drinks
Sangria: 5oz of Red or White Wine, 1oz of Peach Schnapps, Orange and Cranberry Juice. A classic summer refresher!
Screwdriver: Vodka and Orange Juice. A simple and refreshing classic.
Singapore Sling: Gin, Orange Juice, 7-up, Grenadine, and a splash of Lime Juice. A tropical twist on a classic cocktail.
Vodka/Gin and Cranberry: Smirnoff Vodka or Gin and Cranberry Juice. A simple and popular choice.
Tom Collins: Gordon's Gin, Soda Water and a Splash of Lime Juice. A classic gin cocktail.
Caesar: Vodka or Gin, Clamato, Worcestershire, Pickle juice, House made Hot sauce and a citrus wedge. The iconic Canadian cocktail!
Whiskey Sour: Crown Royal, Gingerale and Lime Juice. A classic whiskey cocktail.
Gin and Tonic: Gin and Tonic. A crisp and refreshing combination.
Bar Rail
Vodka, Gin, Crown Royal, Gold Rum, White Rum, Tequila, Jameson
This section lists the various base spirits available for making cocktails.
Available Liquor
Spiced Rum, Tequila Gold, Jameson, Kraken, Fireball, Apple Crown Royal, Jager, Jack Daniel, Sambuca, Goldschlägger, Banana Liqueur, Crème de Cacao, Crème de Menthe, Butter Ripple, Sour Puss Apple, Blue Curacao, Long Island Mix, Peach Schnapps, Triple Sec, Tequila Rose, Coffee Liqueur, Irish Cream, Patron Silver, Don Julio, Talisker
This is an extensive list of the various liquors available at the bar.
Mix Selection
Pepsi, 7-up, Ginger Ale, Diet Pepsi, Root Beer, Coffee Tonic, Clamato, Iced Tea, Soda Water, Water, Lime Juice, Red Bull, Orange Juice, Cranberry Juice, Pineapple Juice

All items on this page except draft available for take-out before 11pm with take-out food
Disclaimer:
They are not a gluten-free restaurant.
The items on this menu are inherently gluten-free.
They have processes in place to avoid cross-contamination during food preparation.
They have a separate fryer for gluten-free items.
Please specify with your server if you need your item to be gluten-free as different processes and some substitutions will need to be made.
